column5: Here goes nothing.Â  Well that's it. If I try one more time I am going to throw this computer out the window. If it would fit I would have flushed it down the toilet long before now but had I done that I would have been following right behind it out of my wife's grasp, LOL. In my personal opinion I feel the pics I am trying to post are worth a gander at. I'll try and find someone more computer literate than myself to help figure out what is wrong with it. I hazard to guess the price of a new one. Thanks very much for all the help you fellas offered. I NEED A DRINK, CHEERS.
